data.title: Environmental policy instruments
data.sourcetitle: Dictionary of Ecological Economics: Terms for the New Millennium
data.abstract: This comprehensive Dictionary brings together an extensive range of definitive terms in ecological economics. Assembling contributions from distinguished scholars, it provides an intellectual map to this evolving subject ranging from the practical to the philosophical.
data.keywords: Ecological economics, Ecological economics history, Ecological economics methods, Ecological economics terms and definitions
